title: Geocoder Module results not in the right country
body:
So I'm using this geocoder module: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/geocoder to gather the latitude and longitude of a whole bunch of addresses situated in Ontario, Canada. For whatever reason when I plot the points onto google earth I'm getting pins as far as Florida in the US, which means the geocodes I'm getting are not right.

Obviously this is not what I want, so I was wondering if anyone is familiar with this module and can help me out or knows of one where I would be able to specify the country.

Note: adding CAN or Canada to the end of the address did nothing to change the geocode.

Example: Entering the address 11 SANDY POINT, TORRANCE, ON on google maps will bring up a pin in Ontario (where it's supposed to be) yet the geocode created from this address is situated in Pennsylvania, USA

Thanks in advance!
